item.title: Featured Articles
item.description: Let us know if you have published using ggtree and your publication will be featured here. 2017 Phylogenetic analysis of the human antibody repertoire reveals quantitative signatures of immune senescence and aging. PNAS, 2017 Horses in Denmark Are a Reservoir of Diverse Clones of Methicillin-Resistant and -Susceptible Staphylococcus aureus. Frontiers in Microbiology, 2017, 8:543 Gut metagenomes of type 2 diabetic patients have characteristic single-nucleotide polymorphism distribution in Bacteroides coprocola. Microbiome, 2017, 5:15
